title: I bought a $48 GTX 1050 Ti on Wish.com
tags: i bought a $48 gtx 1050 ti on wish
description: I have been seeing a lot of ads on YouTube for the website Wish.com lately and it made me wonder: Is it still a scam?  I bought a $48 GTX 1050 ti, and there is something a bit dodgy about it.  Here is the video where Phil fixes a similar fake GPU:   Are you looking for some new clothes? Shop at  to support the channel while looking as classy as Dawid :D  -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate- Instagram:  Twitter:  YouTube:
